product_name: Mountain Hardwear Mighty Power Sport Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The smooth, stretchy fabric of the women's Mountain Hardwear Mighty Power Sport Tank Top wicks moisture and dries quickly to keep you dry and comfortable at the gym, running trails or cross-training. Polyester/spandex fabric stretches, wicks away sweat and dries quickly. Integrated shelf bra and wide, comfortable cross-straps add support. Flatlock seam construction eliminates chafing. Mesh at center back provides ample venting. Reflective trim on the Mountain Hardwear Mighty Power Sport Tank Top increases your visibility in low light conditions.
short_description: The smooth, stretchy fabric of the women's Mountain Hardwear Mighty Power Sport Tank Top wicks moisture and dries quickly to keep you dry and comfortable at the gym, running trails or cross-training.
